SummaryEnglish: The spirit world, the real world and the Internet cyber world maintain peace and harmony with the power of the Dimension stone, which was created by the three deities named Dragon King, Zeus and Zoolu. Thief Lupin and his sidekick Pigu decide to steal the Dimension stone, which sends the spirit world into turmoil, and transports Lupin and many other spirits to the Internet. Now it's A-jang's job to catch the thiefs, take the Dimension stone back where it belongs, and return balance to three worlds, with the help of his fellow spirits and three kids.

1.SummaryEnglish: Dimension stone, which maintains peace and harmony between the spirit world, the real world and the Internet cyber world gets stolen, so A-jang and friends go to cyber world to retrieve it.

6.TitleEnglish: Nana in the Fairy Tale Land

10.SummaryEnglish: Lupin turns the hands of Midas into Virus hands in order to take over a weather control satellite.

12.SummaryEnglish: Pigu disguises as a woman in order to seduce Argo into revealing him on which website A-Jang hides and to turn of the firewall. Our heroes get trapped and taken to Lupin's base, but they fight back manage to win and take the dimension stone with them, which causes the base to blow up. All seems well, and our heroes happily return to the spirit world knowing they return peace and natural order of things, but is the fight really done?

13.TitleEnglish: The End of the Thief Lupin
13.SummaryEnglish: Lupin survives the base explosion. Virus consumes him completely & transform into an entirely new shape. While A-Jang & the gang celebrate victory, Lupin gpes to his house to get a time machine he stole long ago so he could return to the past to the day he stole the Dimension stone and have his revenge on A-jang.
